title: Mark Hopkins (1802-1887), Class of 1824, Fourth President of Williams College 1836-1872, College Trustee 1872-1887
medium: charcoal on paper mounted to board
description: Enlargement. Charcoal of medium weight, machine made, wove, western paper containing rag fiber and chemical woodpulp
inscriptions: verso c. on mount in ink on sticker: Property of Mark Hopkins/ Williamstown, Mass.   by Miss Whitman
